name: NSURLDownload
desc: An object that downloads a resource asynchronously and saves the data to a file.

items.name: func setDestination(String, allowOverwrite: Bool)
items.desc: Sets the destination path of the downloaded file.

items.name: class func canResumeDownloadDecoded(withEncodingMIMEType: String) -> Bool
items.desc: Returns whether a URL download object can resume a download that was decoded with the specified MIME type.

items.name: var resumeData: Data?
items.desc: Returns the resume data for a download that is not yet complete.

items.name: var deletesFileUponFailure: Bool
items.desc: Returns whether the receiver deletes partially downloaded files when a download stops prematurely.

items.name: func cancel()
items.desc: Cancels the receiver’s download and deletes the downloaded file.

items.name: var request: URLRequest
items.desc: Returns the request that initiated the receiver’s download.

items.name: var deletesFileUponFailure: Bool
items.desc: Returns whether the receiver deletes partially downloaded files when a download stops prematurely.
